lyrics:
6 contributorsbig time lyricsverse 1
my hair might be a little too long for your taste my friend
my car might cost a little less than that suit youre wearing
im glad you stumbled in here on your business trip
before you close your tab remember i play for tips

prechorus 1
well i bet your wife is beautiful
and youre a really big soandso
well im not doin bad myself
hey friend dont you know

chorus 1
i play guitar and i sing my songs in the sunshine
captain and cokes and bar room jokes keep me feeling fine

chorus 2
and theres always a stage and a beautiful babe
to squeeze my lime
in my simple way guess you could say
im living in the big time

verse 2
i know ill probably never make a million bucks
but savings accounts and the irs never worry me much
i dont need that stuff cause ive got friends like you
to buy me drinks have boats and planes that i can use
you might also likeprechorus 2
i know youre really living
in that house up on the hill
so if you feel like giving
friend ive got a jar to fill

chorus 1
i play guitar and i sing my songs in the sunshine
captain and cokes and bar room jokes keep me feelin fine

chorus 2
and theres always a stage and a beautiful babe
to squeeze my lime
in my simple way guess you could say
im living in the big time

bridge
im having the time of my life
no worries on my mind
everythings just fine
today is even better than yesterday
everythings going my way
im livin in the big time

chorus 2
and theres always a stage and a beautiful babe
to squeeze my lime
in my simple way guess you could say
im living in the big time
outro
in my simple way guess you could say
im living in the big timeembed
